Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Mayors veto and disapproval message of Introductory Number 67-A, in relation to prohibiting the City from doing business with institutions that engage, directly or indirectly, in predatory lending practices, and to regulate the participation of home improvement contractors in the home-loan market.
Items.MatterName: Veto, Int. No. 67-A - Prohibit business with institutions that engage in predatory lending practices.
